config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _d is used in the catena function to determine the value of d, which is obtained using the get_d() method. This value is then used in the computation of the tweak t, which is further used in hashing the password.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _d is triggered every time the catena function is called to hash a password, which depends on the frequency of password hashing operations in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option _d on the system is related to the computation of the tweak t and the overall hashing process. The value of d affects the size and complexity of the tweak computation, which can impact the performance of the password hashing operation.
